snippet.title: Fantasy Friends: Under The Sea - Teaser
snippet.description:
It's time to cuddle 12 new magical little friends in an entire new environment! Learn how to feed them, play with them, take good care of them! Unlock plenty of skins and customization items while playing mini-games with your swimming friends! Look at them dancing and smiling all together... How could they be that cute?

Fantasy Friends: Under The Sea will release this fall!

More information : https://www.justforgames.com/product/fantasy-friends-under-the-sea

Come & discuss with us on our Discord :
discord.me/justforgames

Follow us on social networks :
